capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_COPY_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to copy a DriveItem (file or folder) to a new location asynchronously. Use when you need to duplicate an item, optionally renaming it or specifying a different parent folder. The operation is asynchronous; the response provides a URL to monitor the copy progress.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_CREATE_LINK
capabilities.description: Tool to create a sharing link for a DriveItem (file or folder) by its unique ID. Use when you need to generate a shareable link for an item in OneDrive or SharePoint.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_DELETE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a DriveItem (file or folder) by its unique ID from the authenticated user's OneDrive. Use when you need to remove an item from OneDrive. This action moves the item to the recycle bin, not permanently deleting it.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_DOWNLOAD_FILE
capabilities.description: Downloads a file from a user's OneDrive using its item ID, which must refer to a file and not a folder.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_GET_DRIVE
capabilities.description: Retrieves the properties and relationships of a Drive resource by its unique ID. Use this action when you need to get details about a specific OneDrive, user's OneDrive, group's document library, or a site's document library.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_GET_ITEM
capabilities.description: Retrieves the metadata of a DriveItem by its unique ID. Use this tool to get information about a specific file or folder in OneDrive when you have its ID. If a `drive_id` is not provided, it defaults to the user's main drive.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_GET_ITEM_PERMISSIONS
capabilities.description: Retrieves the permissions of a DriveItem by its unique ID or path within a specific Drive. Use when you need to check who has access to a file or folder and what level of access they have.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_GET_ITEM_THUMBNAILS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve the thumbnails associated with a DriveItem. Use when you need to display visual previews of files.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_GET_ITEM_VERSIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve the version history of a DriveItem by its unique ID. Use when you need to access or list previous versions of a file.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_GET_QUOTA
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve the quota information for the authenticated user's OneDrive. Use this action to check the storage space details like total, used, and remaining space on the user's OneDrive.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_GET_RECENT_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Get files and folders recently accessed by the user. Returns items based on activity history (opened, edited, viewed), sorted by most recent first. Use when you need to see what the user worked on recently (e.g., 'Show me files I worked on today'). Different from search - this tracks activity, not content.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_GET_SHARED_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of items that have been shared with the authenticated user. Use this action to get details of files and folders shared with the current user.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_GET_SHAREPOINT_LIST_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Tool to get the items (list items) within a specific SharePoint list on a site. Use when you need to retrieve data from a SharePoint list.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_GET_SITE_DETAILS
capabilities.description: Retrieves metadata for a specific SharePoint site by its ID. Use this action when you need to get details like display name, web URL, and creation/modification dates for a known SharePoint site.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_GET_SITE_PAGE_CONTENT
capabilities.description: Gets the content of a modern SharePoint site page. Use when you need to retrieve the details and content of a specific page within a SharePoint site.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_INVITE_USER_TO_DRIVE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to invite users or grant permissions to a specific item in a OneDrive drive. Use when you need to share a file or folder with other users and define their access level (e.g., read or write).

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_LIST_DRIVE_ITEM_ACTIVITIES
capabilities.description: Tool to list recent activities for a specific item in a OneDrive drive. Use when you need to track changes or actions performed on a file or folder.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_LIST_DRIVES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of Drive resources available to the authenticated user, or for a specific user, group, or site. Use when you need to find out what drives are accessible.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_LIST_ROOT_DRIVE_CHANGES
capabilities.description: Tool to list changes in the root of the user's primary drive using a delta token. Use when you need to track file and folder modifications, additions, or deletions in the main OneDrive directory.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_LIST_SHAREPOINT_LIST_ITEMS_DELTA
capabilities.description: Tool to track changes to items in a SharePoint list using a delta query. Use when you need to get newly created, updated, or deleted list items without performing a full read of the entire item collection.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_LIST_SITE_COLUMNS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all column definitions for a SharePoint site. Use this when you need to retrieve the schema or structure of columns within a specific SharePoint site.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_LIST_SITE_DRIVE_ITEMS_DELTA
capabilities.description: Tool to track changes to DriveItems in the default document library of a SharePoint site. Use when you need to get a list of items that have been added, modified, or deleted since a previous state or to get an initial enumeration of all items.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_LIST_SITE_LISTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all lists under a specific SharePoint site. Use when you need to enumerate lists within a known site.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_LIST_SITE_SUBSITES
capabilities.description: Tool to list all subsites of a SharePoint site. Use when you need to retrieve a collection of subsites for a given parent site.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_LIST_SUBSCRIPTIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to list the current subscriptions for the authenticated user or app. Use this to retrieve details of existing webhook subscriptions.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_MOVE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to move a file or folder to a new parent folder in OneDrive. Use when you need to reorganize your files or folders by changing their location. You can optionally rename the item during the move.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_ONEDRIVE_CREATE_FOLDER
capabilities.description: Creates a new folder in the user's OneDrive, automatically renaming on conflict, optionally within a specified parent_folder (by ID or full path from root) which, if not the root, must exist and be accessible.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_ONEDRIVE_CREATE_TEXT_FILE
capabilities.description: Creates a new text file with specified content in a OneDrive folder, using either the folder's unique ID or its absolute path (paths are automatically resolved to IDs); note that OneDrive may rename or create a new version if the filename already exists.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_ONEDRIVE_FIND_FILE
capabilities.description: Non-recursively finds an item (file or folder) in a specified OneDrive folder; if `folder` is provided as a path, it must actually exist.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_ONEDRIVE_FIND_FOLDER
capabilities.description: Finds folders by name within an accessible parent folder in OneDrive, or lists all its direct child folders if no name is specified.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_ONEDRIVE_LIST_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Retrieves all files and folders as `driveItem` resources from the root of a specified user's OneDrive, automatically handling pagination.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_ONEDRIVE_UPLOAD_FILE
capabilities.description: Uploads a file to a specified OneDrive folder, automatically renaming on conflict and supporting large files via chunking.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_PREVIEW_DRIVE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Generates or retrieves a short-lived embeddable URL for a preview of a specific item. Use when you need to display a temporary preview of a file.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_SEARCH_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Search OneDrive for files and folders by keyword. Searches filenames, metadata, and file content to find matching items. Use when you need to find specific files based on keywords, file types, or content (e.g., 'Find all PDFs containing budget'). Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination.

capabilities.name: ONE_DRIVE_UPDATE_DRIVE_ITEM_METADATA
capabilities.description: Tool to update the metadata of a specific item (file or folder) in OneDrive. Use this to rename items, change descriptions, or move items to a new parent folder.
